trackers.name: adobetarget.data.adobedc.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Adobe Target, a tool that helps websites test and personalize content for visitors. It monitors user behavior to deliver tailored experiences, such as showing different versions of a webpage to see which performs better.
trackers.tracking_type: Behavioral tracking, A/B testing, experience targeting
trackers.common_sites: Large e-commerce platforms, media outlets, and enterprise websites
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects user interaction data to optimize content delivery; operates across multiple domains for consistent user experiences.

trackers.name: static.cloudflareinsights.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Cloudflare Web Analytics, a privacy-focused tool that helps website owners understand site performance and visitor behavior without using cookies or collecting personal data.
trackers.tracking_type: Page load metrics, visitor counts, referrer data
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Cloudflare services or seeking privacy-centric analytics solutions
trackers.privacy_notes: Does not use cookies or fingerprinting; designed to respect user privacy while providing essential analytics.

trackers.name: cdn.cookielaw.org
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of OneTrust's cookie consent management platform, helping websites comply with privacy laws by displaying cookie banners and storing user consent preferences.
trackers.common_sites: Websites implementing GDPR or CCPA compliance banners
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily used for storing user consent preferences; however, some implementations may involve tracking scripts.

trackers.name: dpm.demdex.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Adobe Audience Manager. It helps websites identify and track visitors across different sites by assigning a unique ID to each user. This enables personalized advertising and content based on user behavior.
trackers.purpose: User identification and cross-site tracking for targeted advertising
trackers.common_sites: Major advertisers, publishers, and marketing platforms
trackers.privacy_notes: Assigns a unique ID to users to track their behavior across multiple websites, facilitating targeted advertising.

trackers.name: www.googletagmanager.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Google Tag Manager, a tool that helps website owners manage and deploy marketing and analytics tags without modifying the website's code. It allows for efficient tracking of user interactions and site performance.
trackers.common_sites: Almost every commercial and organizational site
trackers.privacy_notes: Not a tracker by itself, but used to inject trackers into pages

trackers.name: js-agent.newrelic.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of New Relic's Browser Agent, which helps website owners monitor and improve site performance by collecting data on page load times, user interactions, and errors.
trackers.tracking_type: Page load timing, user interaction tracking, error logging
trackers.common_sites: Websites using New Relic for performance monitoring
trackers.privacy_notes: The Browser Agent does not collect personally identifiable information unless explicitly configured to do so. It can be blocked by content blockers or malware scanners.

trackers.name: www.youtube.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of YouTube's video embedding service. When a YouTube video is embedded on a website, this tracker can collect data on user interactions with the video, such as views, likes, and watch time, even if the video isn't played. This helps YouTube gather analytics and serve personalized ads.
trackers.purpose: Video hosting and user interaction tracking
trackers.common_sites: News outlets, blogs, educational platforms, and marketing pages with embedded YouTube videos
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user interactions with embedded videos and can collect data even without video playback. This data is used for analytics and ad targeting purposes.

trackers.name: img.youtube.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is associated with YouTube and is used to load images and thumbnails for video previews.
trackers.purpose: Image loading and video thumbnail previews
trackers.common_sites: Used across all websites that embed YouTube videos or content.
trackers.privacy_notes: This tracker is mainly used to load video thumbnails and images, typically without tracking user behavior directly. However, if YouTube videos are embedded, other trackers from Google (like YouTube analytics) may also be active.

trackers.name: accounts.google.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Google to manage user authentication and account management across various services.
trackers.common_sites: Any site that uses Google for authentication or single sign-on (SSO).
trackers.privacy_notes: Used for logging into Google services and maintaining sessions, but requires consent for data tracking under GDPR.

trackers.name: www.google.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker connects websites to Google's search engine and various services, including ads and analytics.
trackers.common_sites: Almost all websites using Google Ads, Analytics, or embedded search services.
trackers.privacy_notes: Google tracks user interactions for personalization and ad targeting, which requires user consent in certain regions.

trackers.name: fonts.gstatic.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used to serve fonts for websites that use Google Fonts for typography.
trackers.common_sites: Any website using Google Fonts to enhance typography.
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily used for delivering fonts to improve the visual design of websites. It doesn't track user behavior directly, but it may be involved in other Google tracking.

trackers.name: www.gstatic.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Google to serve various static resources like images, scripts, and other content for Google services.
trackers.common_sites: Any Google-integrated website or service.
trackers.privacy_notes: Mainly used to serve static content like images or scripts, which do not require user consent for privacy purposes, though it may participate in broader Google tracking.

trackers.name: id.rlcdn.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Revcontent, a native advertising network, for delivering personalized ads based on user behavior.
trackers.common_sites: Many content and news websites that utilize native advertising from Revcontent.
trackers.privacy_notes: This tracker is part of a larger ad network used to target users with personalized ads based on browsing behavior. Consent is typically required in regions with privacy laws like GDPR.

trackers.name: p.typekit.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Adobe Typekit to deliver fonts and typography for websites that use Adobe Fonts.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Adobe Fonts (Typekit) for typography.
trackers.privacy_notes: Adobe Typekit provides fonts for improving typography and does not directly track users. However, since it is managed by Adobe, user data may be processed under Adobe’s general privacy policy.

trackers.name: use.typekit.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Adobe Typekit to load fonts on websites that use Adobe Fonts, a service to improve typography on webpages.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Adobe Fonts (Typekit) for typography.
trackers.privacy_notes: This tracker serves fonts to improve website design. It does not inherently track user behavior, but it could be subject to Adobe's broader tracking and data usage policies.

trackers.name: connect.facebook.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker connects websites to Facebook’s ad and tracking tools. It enables things like the Facebook Like button and retargeting ads.
trackers.tracking_type: Retargeting, conversion tracking, social plugin tracking
trackers.common_sites: Almost all types of commercial and social platforms
trackers.privacy_notes: One of the most pervasive cross-site trackers, used widely across the web to track user activity for advertising purposes and integration with Facebook’s services.

trackers.name: dlthst9q2beh8.cloudfront.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used to serve content over Amazon CloudFront, a content delivery network (CDN). It often serves resources like images or scripts, but it may also be used for tracking purposes.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using AWS for CDN services
trackers.privacy_notes: May not always be used for tracking, but depending on the website, it could involve tracking via third-party resources.

trackers.name: cdn0.forter.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Forter, a fraud prevention service that helps e-commerce websites identify and prevent fraudulent transactions.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce platforms
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects user data to assess transaction legitimacy and prevent fraud, requiring consent under data protection laws.

trackers.name: cdn3.forter.com
trackers.explanation: Similar to `cdn0.forter.com`, this tracker is also part of Forter’s fraud detection service. It is used to assess the risk of fraudulent transactions in real-time during online purchases.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce platforms
trackers.privacy_notes: Requires user consent as it processes personal data to evaluate transaction legitimacy.

trackers.name: cbf12a88ccce.cdn4.forter.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of the Forter fraud prevention network, helping e-commerce businesses detect and prevent fraudulent transactions.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce websites
trackers.privacy_notes: As part of a security service, this tracker collects user behavior data for fraud analysis and requires consent for data collection.

trackers.name: js-agent.newrelic.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by New Relic to collect performance data about websites, helping developers monitor and optimize the site's speed and user experience.
trackers.common_sites: Websites monitoring site performance
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data on website performance, but may also collect user interaction data. Consent is required in some jurisdictions.

trackers.name: p.typekit.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Adobe Typekit to deliver web fonts on websites. It helps improve typography and user experience across different platforms.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Adobe Typekit for fonts
trackers.privacy_notes: Does not collect significant user data for tracking purposes. It’s primarily used for font rendering and improving site typography.

trackers.name: googleads.g.doubleclick.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Google's advertising ecosystem. It collects behavioral data to personalize ads and measure their effectiveness. It's heavily used for retargeting and conversion tracking.
trackers.tracking_type: Third-party cookies, pixels, and JavaScript tracking
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Google Ads, YouTube, and partner sites in the Google Display Network
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks users across multiple websites to build advertising profiles. Requires consent under GDPR and is subject to increasing regulation under laws like CCPA.

trackers.name: static.doubleclick.net
trackers.explanation: This domain serves static resources like JavaScript libraries and configuration files for Google’s ad services. While it doesn’t collect data directly, it supports tracking functionality.
trackers.common_sites: Sites that use Google Tag Manager, gtag.js, or conversion tracking
trackers.privacy_notes: Though it doesn’t place cookies directly, it plays a critical role in enabling and accelerating ad tracking services by hosting shared resources.

trackers.name: ib.adnxs.com
trackers.explanation: Used by AppNexus (Xandr) for real-time bidding in online advertising. Collects user behavior and interests to serve targeted ads.
trackers.common_sites: Ad-supported websites using real-time bidding platforms
trackers.privacy_notes: Profiles users across websites to optimize ad delivery and engagement.

trackers.name: cdn.adsafeprotected.com
trackers.explanation: Served by Integral Ad Science to assess the quality and safety of ad placements, including fraud detection and brand safety scoring.
trackers.common_sites: Publishers and advertisers validating ad traffic
trackers.privacy_notes: May track viewability and user behavior to detect fraudulent activity or inappropriate placements.

trackers.name: c.amazon-adsystem.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Amazon Advertising to track user interactions for targeting and analytics. Collects browsing history and interactions with Amazon ads.
trackers.common_sites: Retail and ad-monetized sites with Amazon ad placements
trackers.privacy_notes: May combine browsing behavior with Amazon account data for targeting.

trackers.name: licensing.bitmovin.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Bitmovin's video player to validate license keys and monitor player usage for licensing compliance and analytics.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Bitmovin player for video delivery
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily collects technical data on video usage; may include IP and player interactions for licensing enforcement.

trackers.name: pubads.g.doubleclick.net
trackers.explanation: A core domain in Google's ad delivery network (Ad Manager), used to serve and manage programmatic ads and collect performance data.
trackers.common_sites: Publisher websites using Google Ad Manager
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behavior and interests across sessions to optimize ad targeting and performance.

trackers.name: securepubads.g.doubleclick.net
trackers.explanation: Secure version of Google’s DoubleClick ad delivery system, ensuring ads and tracking data are served over HTTPS.
trackers.common_sites: HTTPS-enabled sites using Google Ad Manager
trackers.privacy_notes: Same function as pubads.g.doubleclick.net, with added security. Tracks impressions, user behavior, and conversion data.

trackers.name: bea4.v.fwmrm.net
trackers.explanation: Used by FreeWheel (Comcast) for delivering video ads and tracking interactions. Supports targeted advertising within video streams.
trackers.common_sites: Sites and streaming platforms using FreeWheel for video ads
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks viewing behavior to enable targeting and to report ad performance to advertisers.

trackers.name: partner.googleadservices.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is part of Google's advertising infrastructure, used to manage ad campaigns and track conversions on advertiser websites.
trackers.common_sites: Advertiser landing pages using Google Ads for conversion measurement
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks clicks and conversions from Google ads, often tied to user profiles.

trackers.name: pagead2.googlesyndication.com
trackers.explanation: Delivers contextual and personalized ads on websites using Google AdSense. Also loads ad scripts and collects performance data.
trackers.common_sites: AdSense-enabled publisher websites
trackers.privacy_notes: Monitors user engagement with ads and pages, contributing to Google's ad profile data.

trackers.name: cdn.jsdelivr.net
trackers.explanation: A popular open-source content delivery network (CDN) for serving JavaScript libraries and other static assets.
trackers.company: jsDelivr (sponsored by Cloudflare, Fastly, and others)
trackers.common_sites: Websites using open-source JS/CSS libraries hosted via CDN
trackers.privacy_notes: Does not track users for advertising; may log IPs for DDOS protection and performance.

trackers.name: p8dn7fp1liosd47cq1r3sb455.litix.io
trackers.explanation: Part of a domain used by Microsoft Clarity or other session replay tools for behavioral analytics and heatmap generation.
trackers.tracking_type: Mouse movement, clicks, and scroll tracking
trackers.common_sites: Sites using Clarity or similar tools for UX improvement
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks session-level behavior; may include anonymized IP addresses and device fingerprints.

trackers.name: cdn.optimizely.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Optimizely to deliver A/B testing scripts and collect data on user behavior to optimize user experience and content.
trackers.purpose: A/B testing and user experience optimization
trackers.tracking_type: User behavior tracking for test variations
trackers.common_sites: Sites using Optimizely for experimentation and conversion optimization
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects interaction data to personalize or test content delivery; may include cookies and session IDs.

trackers.name: 8512b548-2306-4976-a576-a880f2c35e4e.edge.permutive.app
trackers.explanation: Permutive is a real-time audience segmentation platform used by publishers to build privacy-compliant targeting without third-party cookies.
trackers.tracking_type: On-site behavior tracking and audience building
trackers.common_sites: Media and publishing sites using Permutive for ad targeting
trackers.privacy_notes: Focused on privacy-first tracking; does not share user data across domains.

trackers.name: live.rezync.com
trackers.explanation: Associated with Rezync, a data synchronization and personalization platform used in advertising and customer data platforms.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce and media platforms utilizing advanced user personalization
trackers.privacy_notes: May be involved in syncing identifiers across platforms to enable personalized experiences.

trackers.name: pixel-us-east.rubiconproject.com
trackers.explanation: Rubicon Project (now Magnite) uses this pixel for ad bidding, user sync, and behavior tracking across the ad ecosystem.
trackers.tracking_type: Cookie-based user syncing and bid tracking
trackers.common_sites: Sites participating in real-time ad auctions via Magnite
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects identifiers and interaction data for targeting and reporting.

trackers.name: get.s-onetag.com
trackers.explanation: OneTag provides header bidding and monetization services. This domain supports script loading and analytics for ad performance.
trackers.tracking_type: Programmatic ad interaction and performance tracking
trackers.common_sites: Sites using OneTag for monetization and ad management
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behavior and interactions to optimize ad bids and campaigns.

trackers.name: ads.stickyadstv.com
trackers.explanation: Used by StickyAds (a part of FreeWheel) for video ad delivery and programmatic ad transactions.
trackers.common_sites: Video platforms participating in programmatic video ads
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks viewing and engagement metrics for video ads; supports targeting and reporting.

trackers.name: eq97f.publishers.tremorhub.com
trackers.explanation: Tremor Video’s domain used for tracking ad interactions, measuring video ad performance, and enabling targeting.
trackers.common_sites: Video publishers partnered with Tremor for monetization
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data on video viewing behavior, device info, and ad engagement for ad targeting.

trackers.name: tag.wknd.ai
trackers.explanation: WKND.AI uses this tag to gather user interactions for AI-powered personalization and marketing automation.
trackers.common_sites: Sites using WKND.AI for AI marketing solutions
trackers.privacy_notes: May collect behavioral and contextual information to power AI-driven content delivery.

trackers.name: cdn.auth0.com
trackers.explanation: Auth0 is a platform for authentication and authorization. This tracker is used to manage user identity and session states for websites that integrate Auth0's authentication system.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Auth0 for user login
trackers.privacy_notes: This tracker manages authentication tokens and user session states but does not track personal behavior across unrelated sites.

trackers.name: cl.k5a.io
trackers.explanation: This tracker is associated with K5, a data management platform (DMP) used for audience segmentation and ad targeting based on user behavior across websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites that monetize via behavioral ads or audience segmentation
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behavior across different websites for ad targeting purposes, often requiring explicit user consent under GDPR.

trackers.name: cl.k5a.io
trackers.explanation: This tracker is associated with K5, a data management platform (DMP) used for audience segmentation and ad targeting based on user behavior across websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites that monetize via behavioral ads or audience segmentation
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behavior across different websites for ad targeting purposes, often requiring explicit user consent under GDPR.

trackers.name: geolocation.onetrust.com
trackers.explanation: Onetrust is a Consent Management Platform (CMP). This tracker helps manage geolocation data for the purpose of presenting user-specific content and ads.
trackers.common_sites: Websites requiring location-based content delivery or ads
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects geolocation data to personalize content and ads. Consent is required under GDPR for location tracking.

trackers.name: tv2-cdn.relevant-digital.com
trackers.explanation: Relevant Digital provides advertising and content delivery solutions. This tracker is used to serve ads and track user interactions with TV2-related content.
trackers.tracking_type: Ad impression and user interaction tracking
trackers.common_sites: Websites using TV2 content or advertisements
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily tracks ad impressions and user interactions on TV2-related sites. User consent is required for collecting personal data.

trackers.name: consent.cookiebot.com
trackers.explanation: Cookiebot is a platform that helps websites obtain and store user consent for cookies, enabling compliance with GDPR regulations.
trackers.common_sites: Websites implementing Cookiebot for cookie consent management
trackers.privacy_notes: This tracker ensures that websites comply with GDPR by managing user consent for cookies. It does not track users beyond consent collection.

trackers.name: macro.adnami.io
trackers.explanation: Adnami is a platform for delivering immersive advertising formats. This tracker helps to serve dynamic ads based on user behavior.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Adnami for immersive ad formats
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user interactions with immersive ads across different sites, collecting data for ad performance analysis and targeting.

trackers.name: assets.adnuntius.com
trackers.explanation: Adnuntius is an advertising platform that provides ad services and helps with ad content optimization. This tracker manages the delivery and optimization of ads.
trackers.common_sites: Adnuntius-integrated websites for ad delivery optimization
trackers.privacy_notes: Monitors user interactions with ads for performance optimization. Cross-site tracking is employed for targeted ad delivery.

trackers.name: www.clarity.ms
trackers.explanation: Microsoft Clarity is an analytics tool that tracks user behavior on websites through session replays and heatmaps.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Microsoft Clarity for user behavior analytics
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user interactions for session replays and heatmaps. Data collected is anonymized unless consent is obtained.

trackers.name: consentcdn.cookiebot.com
trackers.explanation: Cookiebot's Content Delivery Network (CDN) is used to serve cookie consent banners and manage the consent process for websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Cookiebot CDN for cookie consent management
trackers.privacy_notes: Similar to other Cookiebot services, it collects only consent-related data for GDPR compliance.

trackers.name: imgsct.cookiebot.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Cookiebot's infrastructure to load and serve images related to the cookie consent banner.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Cookiebot's consent banner images
trackers.privacy_notes: Used only for delivering consent-related images and does not collect personal information.

trackers.name: gadk.hit.gemius.pl
trackers.explanation: Gemius is a market research company that provides website analytics and user behavior tracking. This tracker helps monitor user activity and engagement on websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites that use Gemius for audience measurement and market research
trackers.privacy_notes: Gemius tracks user activity across different websites to measure engagement and behavior. Consent is required for GDPR compliance.

trackers.name: cdn.jsdelivr.net
trackers.explanation: JSDelivr is a Content Delivery Network (CDN) that hosts open-source JavaScript libraries. This tracker is used to deliver web content quickly and efficiently to users.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using JSDelivr for fast content delivery of open-source libraries
trackers.privacy_notes: JSDelivr primarily serves static files and does not track personal user data.

trackers.name: omny.fm
trackers.explanation: Omny is a podcast hosting and publishing platform. This tracker is used to manage podcast content delivery and user interaction with audio content.
trackers.tracking_type: Content delivery and user interaction tracking
trackers.common_sites: Podcast websites using Omny for audio content delivery
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks podcast listening behavior to optimize content delivery. Consent is needed for collecting user data.

trackers.name: api.omny.fm
trackers.explanation: Omny's API is used to access podcast content and manage interactions with the hosted media. This tracker helps facilitate content access and user behavior monitoring.
trackers.common_sites: Podcasts hosted or managed via Omny
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user interactions with podcasts to improve content delivery and recommendations. Requires consent for data collection.

trackers.name: bt-cdn.relevant-digital.com
trackers.explanation: Relevant Digital serves advertising and content delivery solutions, using this tracker to deliver and optimize ad content across websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites that serve content via Relevant Digital's solutions
trackers.privacy_notes: Used for optimizing ad delivery and monitoring ad performance across supported websites.

trackers.name: cdnjs.cloudflare.com
trackers.explanation: Cloudflare's CDN is used to deliver JavaScript libraries and static content quickly across the web.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Cloudflare to speed up delivery of JavaScript libraries and other static content
trackers.privacy_notes: Cloudflare primarily serves static content and does not track personal data. No tracking occurs unless combined with other tools.

trackers.name: stats.wordpress.com
trackers.explanation: Stats.wordpress.com is a tracker used by WordPress to collect website traffic data and user interaction metrics. It is part of the Jetpack plugin, which helps WordPress site owners analyze traffic and improve site performance.
trackers.common_sites: WordPress sites using Jetpack plugin
trackers.privacy_notes: It collects user interaction data for performance monitoring and analytics. It requires user consent under privacy laws like GDPR.

trackers.name: assets.queue-it.net
trackers.explanation: Queue-it is a virtual waiting room solution designed to manage website traffic during peak load times. This tracker is used to queue users until they can access the site.
trackers.purpose: Queue management during high traffic events
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Queue-it to manage user traffic during peak periods
trackers.privacy_notes: Queue-it is used for managing access during high demand, not for tracking personal user data.

trackers.name: static.queue-it.net
trackers.explanation: This is a static resource for Queue-it's queue management solution, used to serve the waiting room interface during peak demand.
trackers.tracking_type: Static content delivery for queue management
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing Queue-it for traffic management
trackers.privacy_notes: Does not track personal user data, only facilitates queue management.

trackers.name: counter.yadro.ru
trackers.explanation: Yandex is a Russian search engine that provides analytics and tracking services. This tracker is used to measure website traffic and track user interactions with websites that have implemented Yandex Metrica.
trackers.tracking_type: Website traffic analytics and behavior tracking
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Yandex Metrica for traffic analytics and user behavior tracking
trackers.privacy_notes: Yandex tracks user interactions for website optimization and traffic analysis. Consent is required under privacy laws like GDPR.

trackers.name: www.googletagmanager.com
trackers.explanation: Google Tag Manager is used for managing and deploying marketing tags (such as analytics and advertising tags) on websites. It helps automate the process of adding, updating, and managing JavaScript and HTML tags.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Google Tag Manager for tag deployment
trackers.privacy_notes: May track user interactions depending on the tags used within the manager. The data is usually for analytics or marketing purposes.

trackers.name: geolocation.onetrust.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of OneTrust, used for managing geolocation data as part of a consent management solution. It helps websites comply with privacy regulations by enabling location-based services while obtaining user consent.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using OneTrust for geolocation tracking and consent management
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects user location data only after consent is given. This is used for compliance and location-based services.

trackers.name: privacyportal-eu.onetrust.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is also part of OneTrust, specifically used to manage user privacy preferences in the European Union. It helps websites comply with GDPR by providing a platform for users to manage and control their data privacy settings.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using OneTrust for managing privacy preferences under GDPR
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily for privacy preference management and does not collect personal data unless consent is provided.

trackers.name: dc.services.visualstudio.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Microsoft Azure Application Insights to monitor and analyze the performance and usage of web applications. It helps developers track issues, errors, and performance metrics for websites and apps.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Microsoft Azure Application Insights for performance tracking
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data related to application performance and errors, not personal user data. Consent requirements depend on the data being tracked.

trackers.name: edge.fullstory.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by FullStory, a digital experience analytics tool that helps websites capture user interactions and behaviors to optimize user experience. It records user sessions for insights into how visitors engage with the site.
trackers.purpose: Session replay and user behavior analytics
trackers.common_sites: Websites using FullStory for user behavior analytics and session recording
trackers.privacy_notes: Records user interactions with the website, but does not typically collect personal data unless explicitly provided. Consent is required for privacy compliance.

trackers.name: owp.klarna.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Klarna, a payment service provider that allows users to buy now and pay later. It tracks user interactions with Klarna's payment system for processing transactions and providing a smooth payment experience.
trackers.purpose: Payment processing and user interaction tracking
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Klarna as a payment provider
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user transactions and payment interactions. Personal data may be collected depending on the service used, and consent is required.

trackers.name: jssdkcdns.mparticle.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of mParticle, a customer data platform that helps companies collect, integrate, and manage customer data across various channels. It is used to collect user interaction data for marketing and customer engagement.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using mParticle for customer data integration
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects user data for marketing and engagement purposes. Consent is required for the processing of personal data.

trackers.name: privacyportal-de.onetrust.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by OneTrust, specifically for managing privacy preferences for users in Germany. It helps websites comply with data protection regulations such as the GDPR by providing a platform for users to manage their privacy settings.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using OneTrust for privacy management in Germany
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily used for privacy preference management. It does not collect personal data unless consent is given for specific data processing.

trackers.name: aax-eu.amazon-adsystem.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Amazon to serve personalized ads through its Amazon Advertising platform. It tracks user behavior to optimize the display of ads based on interests and previous interactions with Amazon.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Amazon Ads to serve targeted advertising
trackers.privacy_notes: Amazon tracks users to personalize ads and improve targeting. Consent is required for personalized ad processing.

trackers.name: sb.scorecardresearch.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Scorecard Research, which provides audience measurement and web analytics services. It collects data to help analyze user behavior and demographic information for market research purposes.
trackers.common_sites: Websites participating in Scorecard Research audience measurement programs
trackers.privacy_notes: This tracker collects anonymized data for market research purposes. It is subject to privacy regulations and often requires user consent.

trackers.name: rum.hlx.page
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of HLX (Hyperlocal), which helps manage web analytics and user interaction for news websites, focusing on delivering content at the local level and optimizing user engagement.
trackers.purpose: User engagement tracking and content optimization
trackers.common_sites: Local news and content websites powered by HLX
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user engagement for content optimization. Data is typically anonymized, but consent is required for processing personal data.

trackers.name: one-to-one.bambuser.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Bambuser, a platform for live streaming and video commerce. It tracks user interactions during live video sessions to provide insights and analytics for streamers and advertisers.
trackers.common_sites: Websites and e-commerce platforms using Bambuser for live streaming and video commerce
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks interactions during live video sessions for analytics and advertising purposes. Consent is required for data processing.

trackers.name: async-px-eu.dynamicyield.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is used by Dynamic Yield, a personalization platform that provides on-site optimization and A/B testing tools. It tracks user interactions to personalize content and offers.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce and content websites using Dynamic Yield for personalization and A/B testing
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects interaction data to personalize content. Consent is required to comply with privacy regulations.

trackers.name: cdn-eu.dynamicyield.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of the Dynamic Yield network, which is used for delivering personalized content and conducting A/B tests based on user behavior data.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Dynamic Yield to serve personalized experiences and run A/B tests
trackers.privacy_notes: Data is used to personalize the user experience. Consent is required for collecting and processing user data.

trackers.name: st-eu.dynamicyield.com
trackers.explanation: This tracker is another part of the Dynamic Yield ecosystem, used specifically for providing user personalization and tracking across the European Union.
trackers.common_sites: EU-based websites using Dynamic Yield for personalization and A/B testing
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behavior to personalize experiences and offers. Consent is necessary under EU data protection laws.

trackers.name: coop.dk.ssl.sc.omtrdc.net
trackers.explanation: This tracker is part of Adobe Analytics, used to collect data on user interactions for websites. The 'sc.omtrdc.net' domain is associated with Adobe's tracking servers.
trackers.purpose: Web analytics and user behavior tracking
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing Adobe Analytics for user behavior analysis
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data on user interactions to provide insights into website performance. Consent is required for data collection.

trackers.name: cdn.consentmanager.net
trackers.explanation: This domain is associated with Consentmanager, a Consent Management Platform (CMP) that helps websites comply with GDPR by managing user consents.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Consentmanager for GDPR compliance
trackers.privacy_notes: Manages user consent preferences to ensure compliance with data protection regulations.

trackers.name: delivery.consentmanager.net
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by Consentmanager to deliver consent-related scripts and manage user consent interactions on websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites implementing Consentmanager's consent scripts
trackers.privacy_notes: Delivers scripts necessary for managing user consents in compliance with GDPR.

trackers.name: b.delivery.consentmanager.net
trackers.explanation: A subdomain of Consentmanager used for delivering specific consent-related resources and managing user consent interactions.
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing Consentmanager's consent resource delivery
trackers.privacy_notes: Handles the delivery of resources necessary for consent management in line with GDPR requirements.

trackers.name: fast.a.klaviyo.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by Klaviyo for tracking user interactions and behaviors on websites, aiding in marketing automation and analytics.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce sites using Klaviyo for marketing automation
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behaviors to enhance marketing strategies. Consent is required for data collection.

trackers.name: static.klaviyo.com
trackers.explanation: This domain serves static resources for Klaviyo's tracking scripts and forms, facilitating marketing automation and user engagement.
trackers.purpose: Serving static resources for marketing tools
trackers.common_sites: Websites integrating Klaviyo's marketing tools
trackers.privacy_notes: Delivers necessary static resources for Klaviyo's functionalities. Consent is required for associated tracking.

trackers.name: static-forms.klaviyo.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by Klaviyo to serve static forms for user sign-ups and data collection, aiding in marketing efforts.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Klaviyo's sign-up forms for marketing
trackers.privacy_notes: Provides static forms for user data collection. Consent is required for data processing.

trackers.name: static-tracking.klaviyo.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is utilized by Klaviyo to deliver static tracking scripts that monitor user interactions for marketing analytics.
trackers.purpose: Delivering tracking scripts for user behavior analysis
trackers.common_sites: Websites employing Klaviyo's tracking for marketing analytics
trackers.privacy_notes: Delivers scripts that track user interactions to inform marketing strategies. Consent is required for tracking.

trackers.name: js.datadome.co
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by DataDome's JavaScript Tag, which collects behavioral data to detect and mitigate bot traffic on websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites implementing DataDome for bot protection
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects behavioral data such as mouse movements and keystrokes to identify bots. Does not perform invasive tracking like canvas fingerprinting.

trackers.name: privacyportal.onetrust.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is associated with OneTrust's privacy management platform, providing users access to privacy settings and data subject request forms.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using OneTrust for privacy compliance
trackers.privacy_notes: Facilitates user access to privacy settings and data requests in compliance with regulations like GDPR.

trackers.name: micro.rubiconproject.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is part of Magnite's (formerly Rubicon Project) advertising infrastructure, used for real-time bidding and ad delivery.
trackers.common_sites: Websites participating in programmatic advertising through Magnite
trackers.privacy_notes: Involved in real-time bidding processes to deliver targeted ads based on user behavior.

trackers.name: cdns.gigya.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by Gigya (now part of SAP Customer Data Cloud) to serve content related to user identity and access management.
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing SAP Customer Data Cloud for user management
trackers.privacy_notes: Facilitates user login, registration, and profile management services.

trackers.name: cdns.eu1.gigya.com
trackers.explanation: This is the European regional content delivery domain for Gigya, serving identity management services to comply with regional data regulations.
trackers.common_sites: European websites using SAP Customer Data Cloud
trackers.privacy_notes: Ensures compliance with regional data protection laws by serving content from EU-based servers.

trackers.name: a26704082161.cdn.optimizely.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by Optimizely to deliver experiment variations and personalization content to users as part of A/B testing.
trackers.common_sites: Websites conducting A/B testing with Optimizely
trackers.privacy_notes: Delivers different content variations to users to test and optimize user experience.

trackers.name: logx.optimizely.com
trackers.explanation: This domain is used by Optimizely to log user interactions and experiment data for analysis and optimization purposes.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Optimizely for user experience optimization
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data on user interactions to analyze the effectiveness of different website variations.

trackers.name: js.datadome.co
trackers.explanation: Serves DataDome's JavaScript Tag, which collects behavioral data to detect and mitigate bot traffic on websites.
trackers.common_sites: Websites implementing DataDome for bot protection
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects behavioral data such as mouse movements and keystrokes to identify bots. Does not perform invasive tracking like canvas fingerprinting.

trackers.name: privacyportal.onetrust.com
trackers.explanation: Provides users access to privacy settings and data subject request forms as part of OneTrust's privacy management platform.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using OneTrust for privacy compliance
trackers.privacy_notes: Facilitates user access to privacy settings and data requests in compliance with regulations like GDPR.

trackers.name: micro.rubiconproject.com
trackers.explanation: Part of Magnite's (formerly Rubicon Project) advertising infrastructure, used for real-time bidding and ad delivery.
trackers.common_sites: Websites participating in programmatic advertising through Magnite
trackers.privacy_notes: Involved in real-time bidding processes to deliver targeted ads based on user behavior.

trackers.name: cdns.gigya.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Gigya (now part of SAP Customer Data Cloud) to serve content related to user identity and access management.
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing SAP Customer Data Cloud for user management
trackers.privacy_notes: Facilitates user login, registration, and profile management services.

trackers.name: cdns.eu1.gigya.com
trackers.explanation: European regional content delivery domain for Gigya, serving identity management services to comply with regional data regulations.
trackers.common_sites: European websites using SAP Customer Data Cloud
trackers.privacy_notes: Ensures compliance with regional data protection laws by serving content from EU-based servers.

trackers.name: a26704082161.cdn.optimizely.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Optimizely to deliver experiment variations and personalization content to users as part of A/B testing.
trackers.common_sites: Websites conducting A/B testing with Optimizely
trackers.privacy_notes: Delivers different content variations to users to test and optimize user experience.

trackers.name: logx.optimizely.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Optimizely to log user interactions and experiment data for analysis and optimization purposes.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Optimizely for user experience optimization
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data on user interactions to analyze the effectiveness of different website variations.

trackers.name: jysk.my.salesforce.com
trackers.explanation: Subdomain used by JYSK for Salesforce-hosted services, including CRM and customer support functionalities.
trackers.common_sites: Corporate websites utilizing Salesforce services
trackers.privacy_notes: May collect user interaction data for customer support and CRM purposes.

trackers.name: d.la1-c2-frf.salesforceliveagent.com
trackers.explanation: Endpoint for Salesforce Live Agent, facilitating real-time chat support between customers and agents.
trackers.common_sites: Websites offering live chat support via Salesforce
trackers.privacy_notes: Captures chat transcripts and user interactions for support purposes.

trackers.name: d.la11-core1.sfdc-cehfhs.salesforceliveagent.com
trackers.explanation: Another endpoint for Salesforce Live Agent, used for managing live chat sessions and support interactions.
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing Salesforce Live Agent for customer support
trackers.privacy_notes: Handles live chat data and user interactions for support services.

trackers.name: widget.trustpilot.com
trackers.explanation: Serves Trustpilot's TrustBox widgets, displaying customer reviews and ratings on websites.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce and service websites showcasing customer feedback
trackers.privacy_notes: May track user interactions with embedded reviews and collect data for analytics.

trackers.name: www.google-analytics.com
trackers.explanation: Primary domain for Google Analytics, used to collect and analyze website traffic and user behavior data.
trackers.common_sites: Majority of websites for traffic and behavior analysis
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data on user interactions, page views, and other metrics for analytical purposes.

trackers.name: app.usercentrics.eu
trackers.explanation: Usercentrics application domain for managing consent management platform (CMP) configurations.
trackers.common_sites: Websites implementing Usercentrics CMP for GDPR compliance
trackers.privacy_notes: Stores user consent preferences to manage data collection in compliance with privacy laws.

trackers.name: app.eu.usercentrics.eu
trackers.explanation: European-specific Usercentrics application domain for managing consent management platform (CMP) configurations.
trackers.common_sites: European websites using Usercentrics CMP for GDPR compliance
trackers.privacy_notes: Handles user consent data to ensure compliance with European data protection regulations.

trackers.name: config.eu.usercentrics.eu
trackers.explanation: Domain used by Usercentrics to serve configuration data for the consent management platform.
trackers.common_sites: Websites utilizing Usercentrics CMP for consent management
trackers.privacy_notes: Delivers configuration settings for consent banners and preferences.

trackers.name: uct.eu.usercentrics.eu
trackers.explanation: Usercentrics domain for handling user consent transactions and storing consent decisions.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Usercentrics CMP for managing user consents
trackers.privacy_notes: Processes and stores user consent decisions to ensure compliance with data protection laws.

trackers.name: consent-api.service.consent.eu1.usercentrics.eu
trackers.explanation: API endpoint for Usercentrics' consent service, facilitating communication between the website and the CMP.
trackers.common_sites: Websites integrating Usercentrics CMP for consent management
trackers.privacy_notes: Enables retrieval and submission of user consent data to maintain compliance with privacy regulations.

trackers.name: fms.360yield.com
trackers.explanation: Part of 360Yield (by Media.net), this domain is involved in header bidding and ad placement optimization.
trackers.common_sites: Sites participating in header bidding for programmatic ads
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user activity to deliver optimized and targeted advertisements across domains.

trackers.name: www3.doubleclick.net
trackers.explanation: Legacy DoubleClick domain now part of Google Marketing Platform, used for serving and tracking ads.
trackers.common_sites: Advertising-enabled websites using Google ad services
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects browsing data and interaction history to serve personalized ads.

trackers.name: cmp.inmobi.com
trackers.explanation: InMobi Consent Management Platform (CMP) domain, used to handle GDPR-compliant consent for ad tracking.
trackers.common_sites: Apps and websites using InMobi for monetization in compliance with GDPR
trackers.privacy_notes: Handles storage and verification of user consent preferences for data processing.

trackers.name: play.google.com
trackers.explanation: Google Play domain used for app store browsing, downloads, and tracking user engagement metrics.
trackers.common_sites: Mobile devices and apps using Google Play services
trackers.privacy_notes: Monitors downloads, app usage statistics, and reviews.

trackers.name: i0.wp.com
trackers.explanation: Image CDN for WordPress.com used to serve images quickly and efficiently from WordPress-hosted content.
trackers.common_sites: WordPress.com-hosted blogs and media sites
trackers.privacy_notes: Serves static image files without setting tracking cookies.

trackers.name: s0.wp.com
trackers.explanation: Static content delivery for WordPress.com, including scripts, fonts, and CSS for website themes.
trackers.common_sites: WordPress.com-hosted and Jetpack-enabled sites
trackers.privacy_notes: Primarily serves non-personalized resources for UI rendering.

trackers.name: stats.wp.com
trackers.explanation: Tracks user visits and behavior across WordPress.com and Jetpack-enabled sites using WordPress stats.
trackers.common_sites: WordPress-powered sites with Jetpack enabled
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks metrics like page views, clicks, and referrers for site owners.

trackers.name: cdn-4.convertexperiments.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Convert Experiences (A/B testing platform) to load experiments and personalization scripts.
trackers.common_sites: Sites running A/B tests with Convert
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects visitor behavior to optimize conversion performance and UX.

trackers.name: kit.fontawesome.com
trackers.explanation: Used to load Font Awesome icons via CDN from FontAwesome's kit service.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Font Awesome icons
trackers.privacy_notes: Serves static icon kits, but may log IP addresses.

trackers.name: front.optimonk.com
trackers.explanation: Used by OptiMonk to show pop-ups and personalized messages to website visitors.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce and content-driven sites
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks interaction with campaigns and user behavior across sessions.

trackers.name: challenges.cloudflare.com
trackers.explanation: Part of Cloudflare's Bot Management and CAPTCHA service to distinguish human vs bot traffic.
trackers.common_sites: Sites using Cloudflare for security and performance
trackers.privacy_notes: Fingerprinting may be used to assess whether a user is a bot or human.

trackers.name: cdn.cookie-script.com
trackers.explanation: Serves cookie banners and compliance scripts for sites using Cookie Script.
trackers.common_sites: Sites needing GDPR/CCPA cookie compliance
trackers.privacy_notes: Stores cookie preferences and user consent settings.

trackers.name: cdn.embedly.com
trackers.explanation: Provides embedded content support (like videos, articles, images) across platforms.
trackers.common_sites: News and blog platforms, especially Medium
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks interactions with embedded content.

trackers.name: pay.google.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Google Pay to handle online payments and payment UI integration.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce sites using Google Pay
trackers.privacy_notes: May collect data related to user purchases, device, and location.

trackers.name: hcaptcha.com
trackers.explanation: Main domain for hCaptcha, used to deliver human verification CAPTCHAs.
trackers.common_sites: Websites replacing Google reCAPTCHA with hCaptcha
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks device and browser features to verify human interaction.

trackers.name: api.hcaptcha.com
trackers.explanation: API endpoint used by hCaptcha to serve and verify CAPTCHA challenges.
trackers.common_sites: Sites using hCaptcha security services
trackers.privacy_notes: Supports challenge generation and validation; logs metadata for analysis.

trackers.name: newassets.hcaptcha.com
trackers.explanation: Serves static assets for hCaptcha, including images, scripts, and stylesheets needed for CAPTCHA functionality.
trackers.common_sites: Sites using hCaptcha to prevent bots or spam
trackers.privacy_notes: May log mouse movements, typing speed, and device info to distinguish humans from bots.

trackers.name: static.hotjar.com
trackers.explanation: Delivers scripts for Hotjar’s heatmaps, session recordings, and user feedback tools.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Hotjar to analyze UX
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects interaction data including mouse movements, scrolls, and clicks.

trackers.name: www.instagram.com
trackers.explanation: Instagram’s main domain for content loading, embeds, and social media widgets.
trackers.tracking_type: User behavior and login status tracking
trackers.common_sites: Sites embedding Instagram posts or login options
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks logged-in users across domains and gathers behavioral data.

trackers.name: www.paypal.com
trackers.explanation: Core domain for PayPal’s login, transactions, and embedded payment buttons.
trackers.tracking_type: User ID, transaction tracking, and fraud prevention
trackers.common_sites: Webshops and services offering PayPal
trackers.privacy_notes: May collect location, behavior, and session data to detect fraud.

trackers.name: www.recaptcha.net
trackers.explanation: Google’s alternative domain for reCAPTCHA, used to detect abusive traffic.
trackers.common_sites: Sites implementing reCAPTCHA widgets
trackers.privacy_notes: Monitors behavior (mouse movement, clicks) to assign risk scores.

trackers.name: stripe.com
trackers.explanation: Main Stripe domain for business services, dashboard access, and documentation.
trackers.common_sites: Online stores and apps accepting Stripe
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks payments, fraud signals, device IDs.

trackers.name: js.stripe.com
trackers.explanation: Hosts Stripe.js, the library used to embed and process secure payments on websites.
trackers.common_sites: Any site using embedded Stripe elements
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects user and device data for fraud detection.

trackers.name: m.stripe.network
trackers.explanation: Used by Stripe mobile SDKs for secure network interactions during transactions.
trackers.common_sites: Apps using Stripe mobile libraries
trackers.privacy_notes: Used in tokenization and secure transmission of payment data.

trackers.name: m.stripe.com
trackers.explanation: Handles mobile-specific traffic for processing payments through Stripe.
trackers.common_sites: Mobile apps integrating Stripe
trackers.privacy_notes: May log behavior, transaction attempts, and errors.

trackers.name: merchant-ui-api.stripe.com
trackers.explanation: Back-end API for Stripe’s merchant dashboard interface.
trackers.common_sites: Stripe’s own admin panel and merchant tools
trackers.privacy_notes: Used internally to power dashboard UI for Stripe account holders.

trackers.name: r.stripe.com
trackers.explanation: Redirection and routing service used during payment flows (e.g., 3D Secure).
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce platforms using secure authentication flows
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks status and progress of redirects during transactions.

trackers.name: s.amazon-adsystem.com
trackers.explanation: Amazon’s ad system domain for displaying and tracking ads across various websites.
trackers.common_sites: E-commerce sites, media sites with Amazon ads
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks user behavior for serving personalized ads and tracking ad performance.

trackers.name: arclight.vimeo.com
trackers.explanation: Vimeo’s domain for hosting and delivering video content through the ArcLight framework.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using Vimeo for video hosting
trackers.privacy_notes: Collects data about video interaction including play, pause, and duration.

trackers.name: lensflare.vimeo.com
trackers.explanation: Used by Vimeo for serving dynamic video content through its LensFlare framework.
trackers.tracking_type: Video content delivery and performance tracking
trackers.common_sites: Websites with embedded Vimeo video content
trackers.privacy_notes: May collect user interaction data to optimize video rendering and playback.

trackers.name: player.vimeo.com
trackers.explanation: Vimeo’s domain for hosting and delivering embedded video players.
trackers.common_sites: Websites using embedded Vimeo players for video content
trackers.privacy_notes: Tracks video plays, pauses, and user interaction with the player.
